theFactory:ChargeChargeCharge.NAME: Charge-Up Core
theFactory:ChargeChargeCharge.FLAVOR: The mechanical monsters are enraged by your boisterous actions.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies in the next combat start with #b3 #yStrength.

theFactory:Remembrance.NAME: Remembrance
theFactory:Remembrance.FLAVOR: The Merchant has met their end many times against Spire denizens and irate shoppers alike. Fortunately, even revival is accessible with enough Gold.
